ParticularsDetails
From April 1, 2025, until the date of this Draft Red Herring ProspectusFiscal 2025Fiscal 2024Fiscal 2023
policies specified in Regulation 15 of the SEBI SBEB & SE Regulations in respect of options granted in the last three yearsSBEB & SE Regulations.
Intention of Key Managerial Personnel, Senior Management and whole-time Directors who are holders of Equity Shares allotted on exercise of options granted under RSU 2022, to sell their Equity Shares within three months after the listing of Equity Shares pursuant to the OfferN.A.
Intention to sell Equity Shares arising out of the RSU 2022 within three months after the date of listing, by Directors, Key Managerial Personnel, Senior Management and employees having Equity Shares arising out of RSU 2022, amounting to more than 1% of the issued capital (excluding outstanding warrants and conversions)N.A.
